name: That Balls - Can you shot it ?
name_original: That Balls - Can you shot it ?
description:
This is a perfect game for all the brain training lovers. The game is simple and minimalistic but very challenging and difficult at the same time.

The concept of the game is very simple. Swipe on the screen to adjust the strength of the desired shot in order to get the dot into the box.

The game comes with many different challenging levels with different obstacles to solve.

So don't waist any more time and get this game for free today and start practicing or even better, challenge your friends to see who gets the highest score.

Have fun!
